history.proof: intros t l1 l2 H1 H2. induction H1. shelve.

ctx: intros t l1 l2 H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type f : A -> nat t : btree A l1, l2 : list (btree A) H : cover l1 t H0 : forall t2 : btree A, cover l1 t2 -> weight_tree f t <= weight_tree f t2 H2 : permutation l1 l2 Unable to unify "cover (?M1520 :: nil) ?M1520" with "cover l2 t /\\ (forall t2 : btree A, cover l2 t2 -> weight_tree f t <= weight_tree f t2)".

ctx: intros t l1 l2 H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 2 branches.

chat.content:

f: A -> nat
============================
forall (t : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), cover_min l1 t -> permutation l1 l2 -> cover_min l2 t

Related definitions and lemmas:
Inductive btree (A : Type) : Type := leaf : A -> btree A | node : btree A -> btree A -> btree A Arguments btree _%type_scope Arguments leaf [A]%type_scope Arguments node [A]%type_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
cover_min = fun (l : list (btree A)) (t1 : btree A) => cover l t1 /\ (forall t2 : btree A, cover l t2 -> weight_tree f t1 <= weight_tree f t2) : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop Arguments cover_min _%list_scope
permutation : forall A : Type, list A -> list A -> Prop
cover_permutation : forall (A : Type) (t : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), cover l1 t -> permutation l1 l2 -> cover l2 t
weight_tree_list_permutation : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), permutation l1 l2 -> weight_tree_list f l1 = weight_tree_list f l2
ordered_sum_leaves_eq : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), permutation l1 l2 -> ordered (sum_order f) l1 -> ordered (sum_order f) l2 -> map (sum_leaves f) l1 = map (sum_leaves f) l2
cover_inv_app_aux : forall (A : Type) (t t1 t2 : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l t -> t = node t1 t2 -> l = node t1 t2 :: nil \/ (exists l1 l2 : list (btree A), (cover l1 t1 /\ cover l2 t2) /\ permutation l (l1 ++ l2))
cover_app : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), cover l1 t1 -> cover l2 t2 -> cover (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)
permutation_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> P l2 l1 -> P (a :: l2) (a :: l1)) -> (forall (a b : A) (l : list A), P (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l)) -> (forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> P l2 l3 -> P l1 l3) -> forall l l0 : list A, permutation l l0 -> P l l0
permutation_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), P nil nil -> (forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> P l2 l1 -> P (a :: l2) (a :: l1)) -> (forall (a b : A) (l : list A), P (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l)) -> (forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> P l2 l3 -> P l1 l3) -> forall l l0 : list A, permutation l l0 -> P l l0
ulist_perm : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> ulist l1 -> ulist l2
permutation_trans : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 l3 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> permutation l1 l3
cover_inv_app : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l (node t1 t2) -> l = node t1 t2 :: nil \/ (exists l1 l2 : list (btree A), (cover l1 t1 /\ cover l2 t2) /\ permutation l (l1 ++ l2))
all_permutations_aux_permutation : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A), n = length l2 -> In l1 (all_permutations_aux A l2 n) -> permutation l1 l2
permutation_all_permutations_aux : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A), n = length l2 -> permutation l1 l2 -> In l1 (all_permutations_aux A l2 n)
unique_key_perm : forall (A B : Type) (l1 l2 : list (A * B)), permutation l1 l2 -> unique_key l1 -> unique_key l2
Inductive cover (A : Type) : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop := cover_one : forall t : btree A, cover (t :: nil) t | cover_node : forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> cover l1 t3 Arguments cover [A]%type_scope _%list_scope Arguments cover_one _%type_scope Arguments cover_node _%type_scope (_ _)%list_scope
cover_min_one : forall t : btree A, cover_min (t :: nil) t
cover_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> SProp), (forall t : btree A, P (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P l1 t3) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), cover l b -> P l b
cover_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop), (forall t : btree A, P (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P l1 t3) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), cover l b -> P l b
permutation_one_inv_aux : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> forall a : A, l1 = a :: nil -> l2 = a :: nil
all_permutations_permutation : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A), In l1 (all_permutations l2) -> permutation l1 l2
permutation_all_permutations : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> In l1 (all_permutations l2)
permutation_map_ex_aux : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l1 l2 : list B) (l3 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> l1 = map f l3 -> exists l4 : list A, permutation l4 l3 /\ l2 = map f l4
ulist_app : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A), ulist l1 -> ulist l2 -> (forall a : A, In a l1 -> In a l2 -> False) -> ulist (l1 ++ l2)
permutation_flat_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> list B) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> permutation (flat_map f l1) (flat_map f l2)
permutation_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> permutation (map f l1) (map f l2)
permutation_inv : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation (a :: l1) (a :: l2) -> permutation l1 l2
permutation_skip : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> permutation (a :: l2) (a :: l1)
permutation_app_comp : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 l3 l4 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> permutation l3 l4 -> permutation (l1 ++ l3) (l2 ++ l4)
unique_key_app : forall (A B : Type) (l1 l2 : list (A * B)), unique_key l1 -> unique_key l2 -> (forall (a : A) (b c : B), In (a, b) l1 -> In (a, c) l2 -> False) -> unique_key (l1 ++ l2)
fold_left_permutation : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B -> A), (forall (a : A) (b1 b2 : B), f (f a b1) b2 = f (f a b2) b1) -> forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list B), permutation l1 l2 -> fold_left f l1 a = fold_left f l2 a
ulist_app_inv : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A) (a : A), ulist (l1 ++ l2) -> In a l1 -> In a l2 -> False

``` 
intros t l1 l2 H1 H2. induction H1.
- apply cover_one.
- destruct H as [l1' [t1' [t2' [t3' [Hperm Hcover]]]]].
  apply (cover_node _ _ _ t3').
  + apply (permutation_trans _ _ (t1' :: t2' :: l2)); assumption.
  + apply IHcover_min; assumption.
Qed
```

original: intros t l1 l2 H1 H2. induction H1. - apply cover_one. - destruct H as [l1' [t1' [t2' [t3' [Hperm Hcover]]]]]. apply (cover_node _ _ _ t3'). + apply (permutation_trans _ _ (t1' :: t2' :: l2)); auto. + apply IHcover_min; auto. Qed.
